title: Hopalong Cassidy Troopers News
additional-note: The copyright renewals recorded in the July-December 1977 CCE give the title as 'Hopalong Cassidy Trooper News', but the ones recorded in the registered works database give the title as 'Hopalong Cassidy Troopers News'.  The latter is also the title shown on the front pages of issues we have examined.
